item.title: Add These Pennsylvania Election Fraud Cases To The Pile Of Other ‘Rare’ Voting Crimes
item.description: Death by a thousand cuts may be the best explanation for how U.S. election integrity has been compromised by expanding voting options.

item.title: New Postal Rule Is An Admission That Mail Voting Is A Mess
item.description: This problems with postmarks are more reason why we should limit voting by mail to absentee voting with an excuse.

item.title: The Best Dating App Is Your Local Church
item.description: The best dating app can only start relationships. Churches can nurture and sustain them.
